channel.title: Dos and Donts on Ilm Fruits
channel.description: Recent content in Dos and Donts on Ilm Fruits

item.title: Eid 101
item.description: Below is a fantastic presentation on Eid, based on the sunnah. It outlines the dos and don’ts of Eid. Learn it, share it, and enjoy! Eid mubarak to you and your families, on behalf of Ilm Fruits! SWF from: http://www.outstandingmuslim.com/Eid101/engage.html
